name: Adopt Me
description: Adopt Me allows a user toSelect and adopt animals from anywhere aross Canada

name: QuikSnip
description: QuikSnip allows you to create and share EDITABLE code snippets with ease.

name: Cleep
description: Cleep allows you to copy and paste content across devices easily and in real-time.

name: Stripr
description: Remove those nasty comments you left in your code with a single command... because why not?

name: Hitlist
description: A CLI tool that allows you to execute multiple commands with a single command.

name: PHP Router
description: A composer package that brings Express-like routing to PHP with support for middleware, class-based callbacks, dynamic routes etc

name: NeatHTTP
description: An axios-like cURL wrapper for PHP that allows you to make HTTP requests with ease (experimental).

name: Scrawny
description: A simple console logger for Node.js (not file-system, experimental).
